snippet.title: GOLFR - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
GOLFR® is coming out later this year. https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537630/GOLFR/

Here is our new gameplay trailer showcasing many of the advanced features in GOLFR. In addition to our groundbreaking golfing mechanics, players will face challenges, battle enemies and solve intriguing puzzles as they journey through the deadliest courses in the universe. 

Add it to your wishlist today!

GOLFR® is a third-person golf action game.
Stranded on a mysterious planet, a robot must golf its way through to escape.

#GOLFR #Steam https://www.golfrthegame.com/
